title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Fort Marcy
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     New Mexico Exhibits     Fort Marcy                  Fort Marcy         Four exhibits and a tactile model of the fort help visitors envision the 1846 fort. NPS  First Army Fort in the Southwest Fort Marcy was constructed in 1846 following the US invasion of Mexico. It was built atop a hill overlooking Santa Fe.
